title: Guitar.Hero.3.Stereo.USA.Wii.Custom.GH2
description:
***IF YOU HAVE ANY COMPLAINTS GO FUCK YOURSELVES!!!  THE SHIT IS FREE AND YOU ARE POOR ;-)  OTHERWISE... ENJOY THIS FINE RELEASE!!

Q: Does it work on PAL?
A: It works on my PAL 3.1E, WiiKey 1.9g.

Q:Can I just burn and play?
A:Yes, I have already brickblocked it. But you can do it just to be safe.

Q:Will this erase my old PAL save?
A: No it wont, I&#039;m sry if I caused any confusion, several ppl have confirmed that it will create a duplicate save. sry

Q:I have PAL and I don&#039;t want to erase my save file, can I still play?
A:Yes u can, but just the first stage(and/maybe second stage).

Q:I&#039;m trying to save my savefile to a SD-card but it doesn&#039;t work, what am I doing wrong?
A:Nothing is wrong, you just can&#039;t and I don&#039;t know why, if you find a way please let me know.

Q:Can I play Coop?
A:Yes and no, you can play coop but since I didn&#039;t have the rhythm.fsb you wont hear the bass player, I&#039;m sry.

Q:Can I play online?
A:Yes I think so, I don&#039;t recommend it tho.

Q:What difficulties are included?
A:All of them, Easy, Medium, Hard and Expert.

Q: Are the songs renamed after the original song names?
A: Yes.

Q:The name of the songs doesn&#039;t show up as the original song names from GH2!!!
A:Change your language in the Wii settings to English, this has been reported to work.

Q:I think this sucks, the songs isn&#039;t the same ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¼ber quality as the originals!
A: Just remember that I had to convert every song to 32kHz 4bit so there might be some loss in quality and also.. it&#039;s FREE!

Q: How can I thank you for this?
A:There&#039;s a THANK YOU button on the bottom, press that.


Starting out small

* talk dirty to me -> mother
* hit me with your best shot -> surrender
* story of my life -> woman
* rock and roll all nite -> tonight I&#039;m gonna
